methods.name: glm::hsvColor
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &rgbValue=P
methods.short:
Converts a color from RGB color space to its color in HSV color space.

See also: gtx_color_space

methods.name: glm::luminosity
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &color=P
methods.short:
Compute color luminosity associating ratios (0.33, 0.59, 0.11) to RGB canals.

See also: gtx_color_space

methods.name: glm::rgbColor
methods.parameters: const glm::vec3 &hsvValue=P
methods.short:
Converts a color from HSV color space to its color in RGB color space.

See also: gtx_color_space

methods.name: glm::saturation
methods.parameters: const T s, const glm::vec3 &color=P
methods.short:
Modify the saturation of a color.

See also: gtx_color_space

methods.name: glm::saturation
methods.parameters: const T s, const glm::vec4 &color=P
methods.short:
Modify the saturation of a color.

See also: gtx_color_space
